title: ferfede
author: ferfede
content: Good as andan, I make a query, if you know of something that can generate profit, I have servers Hp 380dl G9 Dual Xeon 2680v4 56 Hilos 256gb ram.I think that the mining of these servers are not profitable.Thanks

comments.author: Coinfarm ventures
comments.body: No, if they don't have GPUs inside, you can't even mine Monero profitably. The power cost will most likely be higher than the Monero revenue. The CPUs are old enough that they probably don't have a lot of L3 cache, so the Monero hashrate will be low.

comments.author: GEMIN_M4
comments.body: Xeon 2680v4 was a beast in its days unfortunately that is no longer the case right now, this CPU has many cores and threads I guess 28, but a second-gen i5 like 2400 or 2500k beats this CPU in performance and all these three cant even mine any CPU coin today, if you don't have high end Ryzen CPUs don't even talk about CPU mining.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: ferfede on May 10, 2022, 10:03:55 PMGood as andan, I make a query, if you know of something that can generate profit, I have servers Hp 380dl G9 Dual Xeon 2680v4 56 Hilos 256gb ram.I think that the mining of these servers are not profitable.ThanksManeuvers do not use such equipment. Try asking the CIA miners. They use separate servers for hard drive plotting, maybe they can give you a solution. Can these servers be upgraded to 512 GB of RAM?Then you can make plotting using RAM resources.

comments.author: MidNite36
comments.body: Your setup is good for Chia mining, do some research on that, you just have to get a NVME for faster plotting, your CPU is good for mass plotting at once, you will need a massive amount of space as well, either HDD or SDD.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: MidNite36 on May 12, 2022, 07:20:16 AMYour setup is good for Chia mining, do some research on that, you just have to get a NVME for faster plotting, your CPU is good for mass plotting at once, you will need a massive amount of space as well, either HDD or SDD.XCH mining does not require a server. Usually, special motherboards with a large number of SATA ports are used for this mining. The server is needed only for plottingOnda B365 D32-D4 Magic Editionhttps://www.amazon.com/Motherboard-D32-D4-Magic-Ports-Mining/dp/B093SXQR8T

comments.author: ferfede
comments.body: Thank you all very much for your answers, I don't know if chia mining is profitable today, I would have to inform myself. Is there another way to generate profits?

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: ferfede on May 14, 2022, 01:25:38 PMThank you all very much for your answers, I don't know if chia mining is profitable today, I would have to inform myself. Is there another way to generate profits?Mining will bring very little profit, for plotting you need to mine CHIA coins. If you are not interested in this and you do not need servers, then consider selling or leasing them.For example, these servers can be used to install an accounting program for a small company so that the server is not located in the office.

comments.author: ferfede
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on May 14, 2022, 02:40:01 PMQuote from: ferfede on May 14, 2022, 01:25:38 PMThank you all very much for your answers, I don't know if chia mining is profitable today, I would have to inform myself. Is there another way to generate profits?Mining will bring very little profit, for plotting you need to mine CHIA coins. If you are not interested in this and you do not need servers, then consider selling or leasing them.For example, these servers can be used to install an accounting program for a small company so that the server is not located in the office.thank you very much for the information, is there any other way to make a profit ?

comments.author: Coinfarm ventures
comments.body: Quote from: ferfede on May 21, 2022, 04:39:01 PMthank you very much for the information, is there any other way to make a profit ?Sell the equipment, buy Bitcoins, then once the next mining gold rush starts, either sell or borrow against the BTC in order to buy GPU rigs
